businessName: BSKC Soil and Septic Services, LLC

heroSection.description: This image showcases the company's expertise in septic system installation and maintenance. It depicts a professional crew working on a residential septic tank, with a backhoe excavating the area and a truck equipped with specialized equipment.
heroSection.callToAction: Ensure your septic system is functioning properly. Contact us for reliable septic tank installation, repair, and maintenance services.

heroSection.description: This image highlights the company's proficiency in septic tank pumping and cleaning services. It features a septic service truck with a large tank and hoses, ready to efficiently remove waste from septic systems.
heroSection.callToAction: Keep your septic system running smoothly. Schedule regular pumping and cleaning services with our experienced technicians.

heroSection.description: This powerful image showcases the company's expertise in excavation and site preparation work. It features a heavy-duty excavator poised to tackle any challenging project, demonstrating the company's capability to handle large-scale jobs.
heroSection.callToAction: Trust our experienced team to handle all your excavation and site preparation needs with precision and efficiency.

aboutUsSection.description: This image showcases the company's commitment to using state-of-the-art equipment and machinery. It features a modern backhoe and other heavy equipment, demonstrating the company's ability to handle complex projects efficiently.

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Leah Cruz
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text:
Miss Sandy is a SAINT!!! And a literal wealth of knowledge…I have never learned so much about septic systems and I owned a septic home for 10 years prior to this one.

For awareness, we bought our home nearly a year and a half ago and have had sporadic septic issues ever since. We used a different company to pump once and they didn’t even reinstall caps properly.

One call to Miss Sandy and not only did her team respond to pump immediately … she personally showed up to discuss our concerns. Then, she took it upon herself to find our original septic approval plans, theorize potential causes for our issues, and give us advice/a way forward. She isn’t coming in to make radical, costly repair suggestions, she is truly coming in to get to the root of the issue through the best means possible.

Long and short, she isn’t in the business to make a quick buck on her costumer … it’s the exact opposite. She truly values and cares about each person she’s called to aid and will exhaust every viable effort with the least amount of cost and disruption. She is clearly driven by morality, integrity and hard work. We will never even consider doing business with any one else.

If you need help with septic routine mx and/or woes as well as install—this is literally the only business you should call!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.address: 150 Shane Rd (also called, Chad Dr, Elmore, AL 36025
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: BSKC Soil and Septic Services, LLC

They were very helpful and patient answering my questions and honest when they couldn’t give an exact answer. They left everything cleaned up and tidy too. I can’t say enough what a relief it was to have such nice people do a great job for us.

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Lance Conklin
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Had a different septic company empty my tank out just under 2 years ago.  Started having issues within the past year.  Did some research and called BSKC.  I had a pretty good idea of what was going now and when they came out I talked with them about it at length.  They answered all my questions and helped educate me on what should be done when a septic tank is pumped.  Come to find out, the previous company did about 50% of what should've been done.  Would definitely recommend BSKC again and will use them going forward.  Availability was a plus as well.  I called them at 8am and they were able to be at my house around 10am. Thank you.

plumberResearchFull.json:
Here is the detailed information about BSKC Soil and Septic Services, LLC, based on the provided identifiers:

## Business Information

- **Alabama Business Registration/License Details**:
  - BSKC Soil and Septic Services, LLC is incorporated as a Limited Liability Company (LLC) in Alabama, incorporated on May 8, 2006[1][5].
  - The business is certified in all State of Alabama requirements for septic services[3].

- **Physical Location and Service Areas**:
  - The physical address is 1514 Harris Rd, Elmore, AL 36025 (note: the address provided in the query seems to be slightly different, but the verified address is on Harris Rd)[1][5].
  - The service area includes the local region around Elmore, AL, and they have worked with many county departments for new installs and repairs[1][3].

- **Hours and Payment Methods**:
  - There is no specific information on the business hours, but they are available for various services.
  - Payment methods include Visa, MasterCard, and all major credit cards, as well as checks[5].

- **Years in Operation**:
  - The business started on August 1, 2004, and has been in operation for approximately 20 years[1][2].

## Services & Specialties

- **Types of Services Offered**:
  - BSKC Soil and Septic Services, LLC offers septic tank systems installation, septic tank pumping, septic tank repair, and any type of dirt work for new construction or reconstruction[1][5].

- **Service Areas Covered**:
  - They serve the local area around Elmore, AL, and have experience working with various county departments[1][3].

- **Emergency Service Availability**:
  - While there is no explicit mention of 24/7 emergency services, the business is known for its prompt response and service[1][3].

- **Prices or Rates**:
  - There is no detailed information on specific prices or rates provided in the sources.

## Customer Reviews & Reputation

- **Review Summaries with Specific Examples**:
  - Although the specific reviews mentioned in the query do not match this business, other sources indicate positive feedback. For example, they are noted for their prompt and reliable service, and their ability to work with county departments[1][3].

- **BBB Rating and Status**:
  - BSKC Soil and Septic Services, LLC has a BBB Rating of A+, but it is not a BBB Accredited Business[1][5].

- **Common Customer Feedback Themes**:
  - The business is praised for its reliability, prompt service, and professional handling of septic system needs[1][3].

- **Response to Reviews**:
  - There is no specific information on how the business responds to reviews, but the overall feedback suggests a positive and responsive service.

## Owner & Staff

- **Owner/Management Information**:
  - The managing owner is Sandy Bradshaw, and the president is Mr. Brent Bradshaw[1].

- **Staff Qualifications**:
  - There is no detailed information on the specific qualifications of the staff, but the business is certified in all State of Alabama requirements for septic services, indicating a level of professional competence[3].

- **Professional Certifications**:
  - The business is certified by the Alabama Onsite Wastewater Board, which oversees septic system installations and services in Alabama[1][3].
aboutUs: BSKC Soil and Septic Services, LLC is a leading provider of septic system solutions in the Elmore, AL area. Our team of certified professionals specializes in septic tank installation, pumping, repair, and dirt work for new construction projects. With a deep understanding of local regulations and a commitment to excellence, we ensure seamless and reliable service for all your septic needs.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Trusted expertise and prompt service for all your septic system requirements.
sellingPoints: Certified by the Alabama Onsite Wastewater Board, ensuring compliance with state regulations.
Extensive experience working with county departments for new installations and repairs.
Prompt response times and reliable service, minimizing disruptions to your daily routine.
